column2: Triple monitoring in screen
column3:
tmpfile=$(mktemp) && echo -e 'startup_message off
screen -t top htop
split
focus
screen -t nethogs nethogs wlan0
split
focus
screen -t iotop iotop' > $tmpfile && sudo screen -c $tmpfile
